property.name: mobile_1
property.value: INSERT INTO mobile_date( mdate, phonenumber, totalflow) VALUES(?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mdate = ?,phonenumber=?

property.name: mobile_2
property.value: INSERT INTO mobile_month( mmonth, phonenumber, totalflow) VALUES(?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mmonth = ?,phonenumber=?

property.name: mobile_3
property.value: INSERT INTO mobile_seasion( mseasion, phonenumber, totalflow) VALUES(?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mseasion = ?,phonenumber=?
